summary: A Grandmother Gave Birth To Her Own Granddaughter, and the Photos Are Amazing
title: A Grandmother Gave Birth To Her Own Granddaughter, and the Photos Are Amazing
body:
From Woman’s Day

On March 25, 61-year-old Cecile Reynek Eledge gave birth to her very own granddaughter, who was originally conceived via in vitro fertilization (IVF) using her father’s sperm and her aunt’s eggs.

When Eledge’s son, Matthew, and his husband, Elliot Dougherty, decided they were ready to grow their family, Reynek Eledge, without any hesitation, volunteered to be the surrogate, telling WQAD8 that, “it was natural instinct.”

But before anything could be said and done there was just one little thing that had to be taken into consideration: her age.

So, Reynek Eledge underwent a series of tests before getting the okay from doctors that because of her great level of physical health she was a totally acceptable candidate to serve as a gestational surrogate.

A bit wow-ed? So was Reynek Eledge, who told USA Today that she kept expecting the doctors to say that she wasn’t a fit: “But the doctors said there is absolutely no reason you can’t go full term. ‘Everything is in our favor,’ they said.”

From there, the process took off and became even more of a family affair thanks to Dougherty’s 26-year-old sister, Lea Yribe, who donated her eggs. Together with Eledge’s sperm, the couple was able to conceive their baby girl, Uma Louise, who was then carried by her grandma.

The two men have shared how much they appreciate the ladies’ help. In an interview with CNN, Eledge said, “More than anything, we feel lucky to have women selfless enough to do this.” And about two weeks before last Monday’s delivery, Doughtery posted a series of photos featuring the team of four on Facebook, saying, “What an honor it is to have these two women in our life. What a beautiful gift this has all been.”

Throughout the entire pregnancy, Reynek Eledge frequently saw a team of medical professionals, most of which whom are high-risk specialists, and “followed things to the letter,” because, as she told USA Today, “I would have felt terrible if anything had happened.”

The only thing that did happen? A positively complication-free delivery of her5-pound, 13-ounce granddaughter last Monday surrounded by an entire team of docs, her husband, son, and son-in-law, among others.

Both Reynek Eledge and little Uma are doing well, and proving that it really does take a village.

('You Might Also Like’,)

  • 60+ Easy and Satisfying Avocado Recipes You Need to Try ASAP
  • “I Used To Love Getting Naked — And Then I Got Pregnant”
  • 45 Inspirational Books All Women Should Read in Their Lifetime

summary: Nargis Fakhri shared her weight loss journey with the fans
title: Nargis Fakhri shared her weight loss journey with the fans
body:
It was not the photo but the caption about Nargis Fakhri’s weight loss journey that was inspiring. She wrote, “Living life in the public eye can be very difficult sometimes. As much as it is a blessing, it also comes with its downside. Over the last 2 years, I’ve gained weight. On the left, I weighed 178 lbs and on the right, I was 129. I have since lost 20 lbs by making lifestyle changes. If I can do it, so can you. Nurture your mind, body, and soul with positive thoughts and healthy choices. I’m going to bring you on this journey of becoming the best version of myself again, and I want you to join me on this journey too.”

http://www.thegossipmongers.com/nargis-fakhris-weight-loss-journey/

summary: Everything about Autism
title: Everything about Autism
body:
Headline : AIIMS doctors develop application to help in timely diagnosis of autism 

Details : 

The News

  • In the backdrop of the World Autism Awareness Day, doctors at AIIMS have developed a mobile app for early diagnosis of Autism Spectrum Disorders.
  • World Autism Awareness Day is observed on April 2 every year.

About the App

  • The app developed is called PedNeuroAiimsDiagnostics.

summary: 2019 NFL Mock Draft: First-Round Predictions (Updated) https://ift.tt/eA8V8J
title: 2019 NFL Mock Draft: First-Round Predictions (Updated) https://ift.tt/eA8V8J
description:
Free agency has come and gone with a bang in the NFL and teams are finally ready to firm up their boards after a raft of pro days from prospects far and wide. With the calendar turning to April, we’re about to hit the home stretch for the final path to the draft so there’s no better time to take stock before it’s time to pack up and head to Nashville for the annual festivities.

So who is going where? Here’s a stab at how the draft could wind up shaking out:


Read the full story on Athlon Sports

summary: We need to nourish and fuel our bodies. I’m finally in the right mindset, and even though I have a bit of ice cream or something...

summary: The Benefits of Exercise  [By: Rebecca Weissmark][[MORE]] It’s 2019 and I’m still struggling to understand why people are still...
caption:
The Benefits of Exercise

[By: Rebecca Weissmark]

It’s 2019 and I’m still struggling to understand why people are still unfamiliar with the benefits of staying active. Do they not understand the importance of exercise or do they just not care? I exercise every day. If there is a day where I know I (sadly) won’t have time to fit a sweat session in my schedule, I’ll still find a way to get moving. But that’s me- I know how I benefit from exercise. Do you?

Let’s jump right into it. Exercise, or really any form of physical activity, instantly improves your overall health. Aside from the long-term health benefits such as improving your risk of developing diseases like type II diabetes, cancer and cardiovascular disease, it also has immediate perks. After a short 30 minute session, you are lowering blood cholesterol level, building stronger bones, muscles and joints, and fueling your body with more energy. Inturn, you’ll end your day in a better mood, feel more relaxed and sleep better. Ultimately incorporating regular physical activity into your daily schedule will enhance your life immensely.

In addition to the benefits listed above, the main reason I work out is for a clear and healthy state of mind. I notice during my breaks from the gym that my brain and mind get foggy. There is no other way to describe it other than my head being in the clouds. When I exercise, whether it’s in the morning or at night, I automatically feel an elevation in my mood. I tend to have mood swings often which is such a struggle within itself. Working out doesn’t fix those mood swings altogether, but it really helps me stay calm and aware.

Creating a healthy state of mind through exercise is attainable. Exercising gives you the distraction you need when it comes to you daily life. You’ll be able to block out those negative thoughts and lift your mood. This happens because exercise reduces your body’s cortisol level while increasing the number of endorphins released in your brain. Cortisol is the natural hormone that is linked to stress, so reducing those levels gives us that relaxing state while endorphins are the natural mood-boosting chemicals that will keep you elevated and happy. Introducing exercise to your weekly schedule will keep your body from building up resistance and keep positivity flowing through your mind and body.

All in all, exercise isn’t just utilized for physical benefits. By working out on a daily basis, whether that be going for a stroll around the block a couple times a day or lifting heavy weights for an hour, you’re giving your body the ultimate total love and care it needs. Every fiber of your well-being will benefit- your muscles, brain and heart, to be exact. Keep loving yourself and giving your body the attention it deserves. Get that heart rate up and maintain that blood flow… your body will thank you later.

summary: Dandelions and other weeds are often demonized in commercials for products like round up, but some of them are just amazing!...
caption:
Dandelions and other weeds are often demonized in commercials for products like round up, but some of them are just amazing! These weeds are often times just the natural and native versions of some of your favorite plants. For example the pineapple weed I collected this morning is a perfect (free) replacement for chamomile tea along with its many other uses. Of course this isn’t the only useful “weed” out there and I am curious to see what others welcome to their yards and gardens.
-Erin Robison

summary: How to Get the Most Out of Your Zumba Workout (Or Similar Dance Class)
title: How to Get the Most Out of Your Zumba Workout (Or Similar Dance Class)
body:
Zumba and also other dance-based workouts are all the rage nowadays, and it’s not a surprise. Dancing classes are pleasurable and also enjoyable means to melt fat and also calories, tone your entire body as well as enhance total sychronisation. Dancing is so much enjoyable, you may not even recognize you’re functioning out, but the outcomes will still reveal when you fit back right into those skinny jeans!

Even though you might forget you’re exercising, doing it appropriately, just like any type of exercise, will certainly assist you get the most out of your health and fitness regimen. Below are some suggestions for making your following Zumba class a real calorie criticism in addition to an outright blast!

Put Some Oomph into It

There’s dancing, and afterwards there’s dance. Virtually any individual can master a couple of basic steps. However there’s a substantial distinction between simply moving your feet as well as relocating your entire body.

Allow on your own to really feel the songs as well as enter it. Don’t simply progression and when you cha-cha. Swing those hips! Get your arms into it, allowing them circulation. Be meaningful with your movements! Fifty percent the enjoyable is tipping out of your convenience area and allowing your body move with the rhythm.

Try altering levels as well. One of the leading keys to an effective Zumba workout is keeping your knees somewhat curved in all times. That does not indicate you can’t sometimes drop it low or jump it up high. Changing degrees turns on the large muscles of your upper legs, offering you an additional calorie burning blast while truly toning those quads and also hamstrings.

And do not overly fret about obtaining the actions ideal - concentrate more on having fun!

Bring Along a Friend or Four

The excellent aspect of Zumba, as well as other dance-based exercises, aside from their enjoyable interest getting fit, is the capability to meet new friends as well as commemorate older relationships, too! Act you and the ladies are gone out to the club when you head to class.

Don’ t neglect to connect to your even more hindered close friends as well. Mosting likely to a Zumba course for the very first time can be a little bit scary - however it’s seriously addictive once you have actually made that first brave step right into the class! So also if your shy pal has actually claimed, “No,” once or two times, do not hesitate to ask again.

Invest in Some Fun Clothes!

Nothing makes exercising much more fun than a cute fitness wardrobe, as well as Zumba intends to please in this! There are a substantial selection of official Zumba-branded clothes available, as well as they are incredibly charming! Or you can simply utilize your brand-new Zumba addiction as a reason to take place a purchasing journey to your local fitness clothes store!

Invest in fun, intense as well as lively colored clothes. Do not stop at shorts, skirts as well as covers, get some intense, fun hair devices, socks and also even jewelry to finish your appearance so you can strut your sexy while you work out!

The Right Shoes Are A Must

The right footwear can make or damage your Zumba or dance workout. Make certain to buy a great set of tennis shoes matched to your body. Individuals with high arcs, for instance, might require extra arch assistance, those with bunions might need footwear made to fit a broader width.

Keep in mind that turning activities while you dance in sneakers can wound your knee, foot or ankle. A simple journey and also autumn from not having the right footwear can easily lead to a busted bone. To prevent injury, it’s also an excellent suggestion to purchase (or make) a pair of Zumba gliders to put on over your footwear. The soft, sock-like textile enables you to twist quickly on any kind of hard surfaced floorings, protecting your knees.

Try a New Instructor

Oftentimes, regulars to Zumba or dance-based fitness classes find a teacher they like and also stay with them. While there’s absolutely nothing incorrect with being a regular flier at your favorite trainer’s course, why not add a little variety to your regular by trying a brand-new teacher’s class currently and also then?

Every instructor has their own unique taste and distinct actions! As well as because dance exercises are everything about expressing on your own, trying courses instructed by various instructors enables you to find out amazing brand-new relocate to integrate into your own dancing repertoire. This can make courses with your favored trainer a lot more fun as you include in your own distinct flavor.

Must Read: Do You Actually Need a Personal Trainer?

Host a Fun Dance Off

Having a cardio dance event blast doesn’t always require to indicate a trip to the fitness center! You can get a great dance workout in, right in the personal privacy of your very own house. This is a fantastic means to reduce into dance fitness if you’re a bit on the shy side, or it can be a fun means to include selection to your regimen when you’re very busy or the weather exterior is a bit frightful.

For those that such as the framework of an instructor-led class without leaving the convenience of house, find a fun application like DailyBurn that collaborates with your computer, TELEVISION, tablet or cell phone. There are commonly a lots of charming dancing video clips on these apps.

For those on a budget plan, why not turn on your favorite online playlist and dancing? Make it an occasion by having a dance-off with your roomies, brother or sisters or youngsters! You’ll all have a blast, and burn calories, as well! Plus you may encourage others on a health and fitness trip of their own.

Fuel Your Body Right

As with any workout regimen, the appropriate nourishment can take your physical fitness soaring to brand-new heights! Sustain your Zumba or dancing exercises with high quality, low-calorie protein such as chicken or fish, as well as vitamin and mineral abundant fresh fruits and vegetables. Avoid processed carbohydrates, as well as rather decide for fiber-rich whole grains like rye, barley and also quinoa.

And do not fail to remember to moisturize, particularly during the hot summer season! Preserving adequate hydration is the essential to great health and fitness. It keeps your skin beautiful and energy degrees high. Drink up! As well as remember, as soon as you come to be thirsty, you are currently dried out. Be certain to bring your water bottle with you to every workout!

Dance Like No One Is Watching

The entire point of any dance-based physical fitness class is to allow loosened, fail to remember the tension of the day and also the work week, express yourself as well as have fun! Don’t be hindered, as well as don’t be worried to try brand-new points– have self-confidence in yourself!

Remember, the energy and also enthusiasm you bring to the class is infectious! Even the best teachers will have a little bit of a lackluster class if the participants seem to go via the movements. By releasing on your own from your inhibitions and also allowing yourself loose to simply dance, you not only develop a far better exercise for you but for the other individuals as well!

So don’t worry if you don’t understand all the actions. Do not tension if the teacher places on a new tune. Instead, just commemorate your body! Smile, do what you can, yet keep in mind that your best objective is to have a great time when getting fit. Keep in mind that everyone else in the course is as well busied with what they are doing to discover if you miss a step or 3! Totally free on your own from your restraints, as well as absolutely dance like no one is watching to obtain the most out of your class!

So also if your shy pal has actually claimed, “No,” once or two times, do not hesitate to ask again.

Invest in Some Fun Clothes!

Nothing makes exercising much more fun than a cute fitness wardrobe, as well as Zumba intends to please in this! There are a substantial selection of official Zumba-branded clothes available, as well as they are incredibly charming! Or you can simply utilize your brand-new Zumba addiction as a reason to take place a purchasing journey to your local fitness clothes store!

Invest in fun, intense as well as lively colored clothes. Do not stop at shorts, skirts as well as covers, get some intense, fun hair devices, socks and also even jewelry to finish your appearance so you can strut your sexy while you work out!

The Right Shoes Are A Must

The right footwear can make or damage your Zumba or dance workout. Make certain to buy a great set of tennis shoes matched to your body. Individuals with high arcs, for instance, might require extra arch assistance, those with bunions might need footwear made to fit a broader width.

Keep in mind that turning activities while you dance in sneakers can wound your knee, foot or ankle. A simple journey and also autumn from not having the right footwear can easily lead to a busted bone. To prevent injury, it’s also an excellent suggestion to purchase (or make) a pair of Zumba gliders to put on over your footwear. The soft, sock-like textile enables you to twist quickly on any kind of hard surfaced floorings, protecting your knees.

Try a New Instructor

Oftentimes, regulars to Zumba or dance-based fitness classes find a teacher they like and also stay with them. While there’s absolutely nothing incorrect with being a regular flier at your favorite trainer’s course, why not add a little variety to your regular by trying a brand-new teacher’s class currently and also then?

Every instructor has their own unique taste and distinct actions! As well as because dance exercises are everything about expressing on your own, trying courses instructed by various instructors enables you to find out amazing brand-new relocate to integrate into your own dancing repertoire. This can make courses with your favored trainer a lot more fun as you include in your own distinct flavor.

Must Read: Do You Actually Need a Personal Trainer?

Host a Fun Dance Off

Having a cardio dance event blast doesn’t always require to indicate a trip to the fitness center! You can get a great dance workout in, right in the personal privacy of your very own house. This is a fantastic means to reduce into dance fitness if you’re a bit on the shy side, or it can be a fun means to include selection to your regimen when you’re very busy or the weather exterior is a bit frightful.

For those that such as the framework of an instructor-led class without leaving the convenience of house, find a fun application like DailyBurn that collaborates with your computer, TELEVISION, tablet or cell phone. There are commonly a lots of charming dancing video clips on these apps.

For those on a budget plan, why not turn on your favorite online playlist and dancing? Make it an occasion by having a dance-off with your roomies, brother or sisters or youngsters! You’ll all have a blast, and burn calories, as well! Plus you may encourage others on a health and fitness trip of their own.

Fuel Your Body Right

As with any workout regimen, the appropriate nourishment can take your physical fitness soaring to brand-new heights! Sustain your Zumba or dancing exercises with high quality, low-calorie protein such as chicken or fish, as well as vitamin and mineral abundant fresh fruits and vegetables. Avoid processed carbohydrates, as well as rather decide for fiber-rich whole grains like rye, barley and also quinoa.

And do not fail to remember to moisturize, particularly during the hot summer season! Preserving adequate hydration is the essential to great health and fitness. It keeps your skin beautiful and energy degrees high. Drink up! As well as remember, as soon as you come to be thirsty, you are currently dried out. Be certain to bring your water bottle with you to every workout!

Dance Like No One Is Watching

The entire point of any dance-based physical fitness class is to allow loosened, fail to remember the tension of the day and also the work week, express yourself as well as have fun! Don’t be hindered, as well as don’t be worried to try brand-new points– have self-confidence in yourself!

Remember, the energy and also enthusiasm you bring to the class is infectious! Even the best teachers will have a little bit of a lackluster class if the participants seem to go via the movements. By releasing on your own from your inhibitions and also allowing yourself loose to simply dance, you not only develop a far better exercise for you but for the other individuals as well!

So don’t worry if you don’t understand all the actions. Do not tension if the teacher places on a new tune. Instead, just commemorate your body! Smile, do what you can, yet keep in mind that your best objective is to have a great time when getting fit. Keep in mind that everyone else in the course is as well busied with what they are doing to discover if you miss a step or 3! Totally free on your own from your restraints, as well as absolutely dance like no one is watching to obtain the most out of your class!
trail.content:

Allow on your own to really feel the songs as well as enter it. Don’t simply progression and when you cha-cha. Swing those hips! Get your arms into it, allowing them circulation. Be meaningful with your movements! Fifty percent the enjoyable is tipping out of your convenience area and allowing your body move with the rhythm.

Try altering levels as well. One of the leading keys to an effective Zumba workout is keeping your knees somewhat curved in all times. That does not indicate you can’t sometimes drop it low or jump it up high. blog.name: slowlybutsurelyxx
blog.title: 🦋
blog.description:
Female. 21 years old. 5'4. Mother of 2.
HW: 225 SW: 205 CW: 170 GW1: 180✔ GW2: 170✔ GW3: 160 GW4: 150 GW5: 140 UGW: 130

summary: April Goals 🗓
body:
April Goals 🗓

So for March my goal was to lose 6 pounds. I actually reached my goal early and then ended up gaining this past week, because I’ve been distracted and not caring about what I eat.

March 1st: 180 lbs

Goal: 174 lbs

April 1st: 176.6 lbs

Loss: -3.4 lbs

So even though I didn’t reach my goal, I still think if I stay on track this month that I can keep the same goal. So for April I’m (again) going to aim to lose 6 pounds, which would put me at 170.6 lbs.

Let’s do this! 👍
